title: I can't seem to progress in rank (Plat)
body:
I try my hardest, I play my highest win % champs, I play everyday, if I'm not doing solo queue I'm watching a LS video or something on LoL or watching montages. I am not toxic and don't troll, I've seen every "getting better at league" video on Youtube and I watch LCS/LCK etc but I just can't seem to get out of Platinum into Diamond and it bothers me a lot. I **really** want diamond and I've been playing League since March 2013 but now that I've hit Platinum it seems impossible to get out of it. I have peaked at Platinum 1 where I was versing Diamonds etc and I do say myself I was having an easy time until I just started losing all of my games no matter how well I played and I really don't know where to go from here. Any tips would be greatly appreciated 
*And yes, I have been coached briefly*

replies.body: I'd rather have "no life" than to be going around on a gaming forum being a total douche to people, because that is having no life lol.

If Riot doesn't ban this guy I've lost all faith in humanity, the perfect example of a toxic troll. Why do you need to be a total douche lol... That's just sad, I can understand you want to get annoyed at me since you're stuck in silver but doing it on the forums to a guy asking for advice is dumb
Almost kek'd such troll omg wowzorssss. Grow up.

> [{quoted}](name=Pentakiruuu,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=3VkcfsOM,comment-id=000300000000000000000001,timestamp=2015-04-13T06:29:19.802+0000)
>
> Almost kek'd such troll omg wowzorssss. Grow up.

growing up is a natural progression in life b0ss. i think i can grow up with you telling me to grow b0ss. ty for your supp b0ss

thats a tilt. i may b only silver but i recently went on a big tilt. take a day or 2 away from it. trust me it helps alot. i watched a video (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vny-dT8dxQI) and it actually started me winning games again as well. it taught me alot (probs cause im low elo.)
I've been stuck for agesss though and whenever I start a losing streak I watch anime and montages to hype me up again and I go back at it until the same thing happens

I highly recommend watching some more of the videos that MidnightFox has given you. Gbay is in the diamond league at the moment and his art of league videos have been a huge help to me,  you might even want to watch his diamond promo video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yuKnovveeJE which is right here. I also think you should focus on getting better at a specific lane and watching motages and videos to get better at that one lane. But it sounds like you've already been doing that. I hope this helps

Stop worrying so much about winning - just take your time and have a break after a loss, it helps A LOT especially if you have a troll or just a disappointing loss. Pick a champion that can carry well and just spam them (provided you're good with them).
